TextField Molecule
├── Label Atom (optional)
│   ├── Typography: text-sm font-medium
│   ├── Color: text-white/90
│   └── Required indicator (*) in blue-400
├── Input Container (relative positioning)
│   ├── Left Icon Atom (optional)
│   │   └── Position: absolute left-0
│   ├── Input Atom
│   │   ├── Background: white/10 + backdrop-blur-sm
│   │   ├── Border: white/20
│   │   ├── Typography: text-base
│   │   ├── Padding: px-4 py-3 (or pl-11/pr-11 with icons)
│   │   └── Border Radius: rounded-xl
│   └── Right Icon Atom (optional)
│       └── Position: absolute right-0
├── Error Message Atom (conditional)
│   ├── Color: text-red-400
│   ├── Typography: text-sm
│   └── Role: alert
└── Helper Text Atom (optional)
    ├── Color: text-white/60
    └── Typography: text-sm

Which TextField variant should I use?

├─ Is this a standard form field?
│  └─ YES → variant="default" (DEFAULT)
│
├─ Do I have many fields in a dense form?
│  └─ YES → variant="filled" (subtler)
│
└─ Do I need to emphasize this field (e.g., search)?
   └─ YES → variant="outlined" (thicker border)
